original: Garbhopaniṣat
analyzed: garbha upaniṣad

original: oṃ pañcātmakaṃ pañcasu vartamānaṃ ṣaḍāśrayaṃ ṣaḍguṇayogayuktam /
analyzed: om pañca ātmakam pañcasu vartamānam ṣaṣ āśrayam ṣaḍguṇa yoga yuktam

original: taṃ saptadhātuṃ trimalaṃ dviyoniṃ caturvidhāhāramayaṃ śarīram // GarUp_1
analyzed: tam sapta dhātum tri malam dvi yonim caturvidha āhāra mayam śarīram garup

original: pañcātmakam iti kasmāt pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśam ity asmin pañcātmake śarīre kā pṛthivī kā āpaḥ kiṃ tejaḥ ko vāyuḥ kim ākāśam /
analyzed: pañca ātmakam iti kasmāt pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti asmin pañca ātmake śarīre kā pṛthivī kāḥ āpaḥ kim tejaḥ kaḥ vāyuḥ kim ākāśam

original: tatra pañcātmake śarīre yat kaṭhinaṃ sā pṛthivī yad dravaṃ tā āpaḥ yad uṣṇaṃ tat tejaḥ yat saṃcarati sa vāyuḥ yac chuṣiraṃ tad ākāśam /
analyzed: tatra pañca ātmake śarīre yat kaṭhinam sā pṛthivī yat dravam tāḥ āpaḥ yat uṣṇam tat tejaḥ yat saṃcarati sa vāyuḥ yat śuṣiram tat ākāśam

original: tatra pṛthivī dhāraṇe āpaḥ piṇḍīkaraṇe tejaḥ prakāśane vāyur vyūhane ākāśam avakāśapradāne /
analyzed: tatra pṛthivī dhāraṇe āpaḥ piṇḍīkaraṇe tejaḥ prakāśane vāyuḥ vyūhane ākāśam avakāśa pradāne

original: pṛthak śrotre śabdopalabdhau tvak sparśe cakṣuṣī rūpe jihvā rasane nāsikā ghrāṇe upastha ānandane apānam utsarge buddhyā budhyati manasā saṃkalpayati  #
analyzed: pṛthak śrotre śabda upalabdhau tvac sparśe cakṣuṣī rūpe jihvā rasane nāsikā ghrāṇe upastha ānandane apānam utsarge buddhyā budhyati manasā saṃkalpayati  /

original: vācā vadati /
analyzed: vācā vadati

original: ṣaḍāśrayam iti kasmāt madhurāmlalavaṇatiktakaṭukaṣāyarasān vindatīti ṣaḍjaṛṣabhagāndhāramadhyamapañcamadhaivataniṣādāś
analyzed: ṣaṣ āśrayam iti kasmāt madhura amla lavaṇa tikta kaṭu kaṣāya rasān vindati iti ṣaḍja ṛṣabha gāndhāra madhyama pañcama dhaivata niṣāda āśrayaḥ

original: cetīṣṭāniṣṭaśabdasaṃjñāḥ praṇidhānād daśavidhā bhavanti // GarUp_2
analyzed: ca iti iṣṭa aniṣṭa śabda saṃjñāḥ praṇidhānāt daśavidhāḥ bhavanti garup

original: saptadhātukam iti kasmāt śuklo raktaḥ kṛṣṇo dhūmraḥ pītaḥ kapilaḥ pāṇḍura iti /
analyzed: sapta dhātukam iti kasmāt śuklaḥ raktaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ dhūmraḥ pītaḥ kapilaḥ pāṇḍuraḥ iti

original: yathā devadattasya dravyādiviṣayā jāyante /
analyzed: yathā devadattasya dravya ādi viṣayāḥ jāyante

original: parasparaṃ saumyaguṇatvāt ṣaḍvidho rasaḥ rasāc choṇitaṃ śoṇitān māṃsaṃ māṃsān medo
analyzed: parasparam saumya guṇa tvāt ṣaḍvidhaḥ rasaḥ rasāt śoṇitam śoṇitāt māṃsam māṃsāt medaḥ

original: medasaḥ snāyavaḥ snāyubhyo 'sthīni asthibhyo majjā majjātaḥ śukraṃ śukraśoṇitasaṃyogād
analyzed: medasaḥ snāyavaḥ snāyubhyaḥ asthīni asthibhyaḥ majjā majjātaḥ śukram śukra śoṇita saṃyogāt

original: āvartate garbho hṛdi vyavasthāṃ nayati hṛdaye 'ntar āgniḥ agnisthāne pittaṃ pittasthāne
analyzed: āvartate garbhaḥ hṛdi vyavasthām nayati hṛdaye antar agni sthāne pittam pitta sthāne

original: vāyuḥ vāyuto hṛdayaṃ prājāpatyāt kramāt // GarUp_3
analyzed: vāyuḥ vāyutaḥ hṛdayam prājāpatyāt kramāt garup

original: ṛtukāle samprayogād ekarātroṣitaṃ kalalaṃ bhavati saptarātroṣitaṃ budbudam ardhamāsābhyantare
analyzed: ṛtu kāle samprayogāt eka rātra uṣitam kalalam bhavati sapta rātra uṣitam budbudam ardha māsa abhyantare

original: piṇḍaṃ māsābhyantare kaṭhinaṃ māsadvayena śiraḥ māsatrayeṇa pādapradeśaḥ caturthe
analyzed: piṇḍam māsa abhyantare kaṭhinam māsa dvayena śiraḥ māsa trayeṇa pāda pradeśaḥ caturthe

original: gulphajaṭharakaṭipradeśāḥ pañcame pṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ ṣaṣṭhe mukhanāsikākṣiśrotrāṇi saptame
analyzed: gulpha jaṭhara kaṭi pradeśāḥ pañcame pṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ ṣaṣṭhe mukha nāsikā akṣi śrotrāṇi saptame

original: jīvena saṃyuktaḥ aṣṭame sarvalakṣaṇasampūrṇaḥ /
analyzed: jīvena saṃyuktaḥ aṣṭame sarva lakṣaṇa sampūrṇaḥ

original: pitū reto'tirekāt puruṣaḥ mātū reto'tirekāt strī ubhayor vojatulyatvān napaṃusakaṃ vyākulitamanaso 'ndhāḥ khañcāḥ kubjā vāmanā bhavanti /
analyzed: pituḥ retaḥ atirekāt puruṣaḥ mātūḥ retaḥ atirekāt strī ubhayoḥ napaṃusakam vyākulita manasaḥ andhāḥ kubjāḥ vāmanāḥ bhavanti

original: anyo 'nyavāyuparipīḍitaśukradvaidhyād dvidhā tanū syād yugmāḥ prajāyante /
analyzed: anyaḥ anya vāyu paripīḍita śukra dvaidhyāt dvidhā tanū syāt yugmāḥ prajāyante

original: pañcātmakaḥ samarthaḥ pañcātmikā cetasā buddhir gandharasādijñānākṣarākṣaram oṃkāraṃ cintayatīti tad ekākṣaraṃ jñātvāṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ ṣoḍaśa  #
analyzed: pañca ātmakaḥ samarthaḥ pañca ātmikā cetasā buddhiḥ gandha rasa ādi jñāna akṣara akṣaram oṃkāram cintayati iti tat ekākṣaram jñātvā aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ ṣoḍaśa

original: vikārāḥ śarīre tasyaiva dehinaḥ /
analyzed: vikārāḥ śarīre tasya eva dehinaḥ

original: atha mātrāśitapītanāḍīsūtragatena prāṇa āpyāyate /
analyzed: atha mātra aśita pīta nāḍī sūtra gatena prāṇaḥ āpyāyate

original: atha navame māsi sarvalakṣaṇajñānasampūrṇo bhavati pūrvajātiṃ smarati śubhāśubhaṃ ca karma vindati // GarUp_4
analyzed: atha navame māsi sarva lakṣaṇa jñāna sampūrṇaḥ bhavati pūrva jātim smarati śubha aśubham ca karma vindati garup

original: pūrvayonisahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā caiva tato mayā /
analyzed: pūrva yoni sahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā ca eva tatas mayā

original: āhārā vividhā bhuktāḥ pītā nānāvidhāḥ stanāḥ /
analyzed: āhārāḥ vividhāḥ bhuktāḥ pītāḥ nānāvidhāḥ stanāḥ

original: jātaś caiva mṛtaś caiva janma caiva punaḥ punaḥ // GarUp_5
analyzed: jātaḥ ca eva mṛtaḥ ca eva janma ca eva punar punar garup

original: yan mayā parijanasyārthe kṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham /
analyzed: yat mayā parijanasya arthe kṛtam karma śubha aśubham

original: ekākī tena dahye 'haṃ gatās te phalabhoginaḥ // GarUp_6
analyzed: ekākī tena dahye aham gatāḥ te phala bhoginaḥ garup

original: aho duḥkhodadhau magno na paśyāmi pratikriyām /
analyzed: aho duḥkha udadhau magnaḥ na paśyāmi pratikriyām

original: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat prapadye maheśvaram // GarUp_7
analyzed: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye aham tat prapadye maheśvaram garup

original: aśubhakṣayakartāraṃ phalamuktipradāyakam /
yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat prapadye nārāyaṇam // GarUp_8
analyzed: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye aham tat prapadye nārāyaṇam garup

original: aśubhakṣayakartāraṃ phalamuktipradāyakam /
yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat sāṃkhyaṃ yogam abhyase // GarUp_9
analyzed: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye aham tat sāṃkhyam yogam abhyase garup

original: aśubhakṣayakartāraṃ phalamuktipradāyakam /
yadi yonyāḥ pramuñcāmi dhyāye brahma sanātanam // GarUp_10
analyzed: yadi yonyāḥ pramuñcāmi dhyāye brahma sanātanam

original: atha yonidvāraṃ samprāpto yantreṇāpīḍyamāno mahatā duḥkhena jātamātras tu vaiṣṇavena vāyunā saṃspṛṣṭas tadā na smarati janma maraṇāni na ca  #
analyzed: atha yonidvāram samprāptaḥ yantreṇa āpīḍyamānaḥ mahatā duḥkhena jāta mātraḥ tu vaiṣṇavena vāyunā saṃspṛṣṭaḥ tadā na smarati janma maraṇāni na ca

original: karma śubhāśubhaṃ vindati // GarUp_11
analyzed: karma śubha aśubham vindati

original: śarīram iti kasmāt agnayo hy atra śriyante jñānāgnir darśanāgniḥ koṣṭhāgnir iti tatra koṣṭhāgnir nāmāśitapītalehyacoṣyaṃ pacati /
analyzed: śarīram iti kasmāt agnayaḥ hi atra śriyante jñāna agniḥ darśana agniḥ koṣṭha agniḥ iti tatra koṣṭha agniḥ nāma aśita pīta lehya coṣyam pacati

original: darśanāgnī rūpāṇāṃ darśanaṃ karoti /
analyzed: darśana agniḥ rūpāṇām darśanam karoti

original: jñānāgniḥ śubhāśubhaṃ ca karma vindati /
analyzed: jñāna agniḥ śubha aśubham ca karma vindati

original: trīṇi sthānāni bhavanti mukhe āhavanīya udare gārhapatyo hṛdi dakṣiṇāgniḥ ātmā yajamāno
analyzed: trīṇi sthānāni bhavanti mukhe āhavanīya udare gārhapatyaḥ hṛdi dakṣiṇāgniḥ ātmā yajamānaḥ

original: mano brahmā lobhādayaḥ paśavo dhṛtir dīkṣā saṃtoṣaś ca buddhīndriyāṇi yajñapātrāṇi
analyzed: manaḥ brahmā lobha ādayaḥ paśavaḥ dhṛtiḥ dīkṣā saṃtoṣaḥ ca buddhīndriyāṇi yajña pātrāṇi

original: karmendriyāṇi havīṃṣi śiraḥ kapālaṃ keśā darbhāḥ mukham antarvediḥ catuṣkapālaṃ śiraḥ
analyzed: karmendriyāṇi havīṃṣi śiraḥ kapālam keśāḥ darbhāḥ mukham antarvediḥ catuṣkapālam śiraḥ

original: ṣoḍaśa pārśvadantapaṭalāni saptottaraṃ marmaśataṃ sāśītikaṃ saṃdhiśataṃ sanavakaṃ
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa pārśva danta paṭalāni sapta uttaram marma śatam sa aśītikam saṃdhi śatam sa navakam

original: snāyuśataṃ sapta sirāśatāni pañca majjāśatāni asthīni ca ha vai trīṇi śatāni ṣaṣṭiḥ
analyzed: snāyu śatam sapta sirā śatāni pañca majjā śatāni asthīni ca ha vai trīṇi śatāni ṣaṣṭiḥ

original: sārdhacatasro romāṇi koṭyo hṛdayaṃ palāny aṣṭau dvādaśa palā jihvā pittaprasthaṃ
analyzed: sārdha catasraḥ romāṇi koṭyaḥ hṛdayam palāni aṣṭau dvādaśa palāḥ jihvā pitta prastham

original: kaphasyāḍhakaṃ śukrakuḍavaṃ medaḥ prasthau dvāv aniyataṃ mūtrapurīṣam āhāraparimāṇāt /
analyzed: kaphasya āḍhakam śukra kuḍavam medaḥ prasthau dvau aniyatam mūtra purīṣam āhāra parimāṇāt

original: paippalādaṃ mokṣaśāstraṃ paippalādaṃ mokṣaśāstram iti // GarUp_12
analyzed: paippalādam mokṣa śāstram paippalādam mokṣa śāstram iti
